summary: Frontend UI Redesign Testing - All 12 features tested successfully. Chat page at root URL (/), Admin dashboard at /admin with full sidebar navigation, WORKCLAW branding, session management, agent picker, tool call badges with proper names, markdown rendering (lists, links, headers), connection indicator 'live' status, /api/health endpoint working.

issues: React hydration warnings in console: '<thead>/<tbody> cannot be a child of <span>' - caused by markdown rendering library wrapping table elements, cosmetic only, tables render correctly

passed_tests: Chat page loads at root URL (/) with session sidebar, message area, and input
Admin dashboard loads at /admin with sidebar navigation
Admin sidebar nav links work - Overview, Agents, Skills, Memory, Tasks, Notifications, Gmail, Slack, Config
Chat page has WORKCLAW branding in header, settings gear links to /admin
Session sidebar shows existing sessions (40+ sessions found), clicking one loads its messages
New Chat button opens agent picker dropdown with 10 agents
Chat input accepts text and sends messages (send button enabled when text present)
Tool call badges display tool name correctly (e.g., 'browser_use', 'web_search' - not generic 'tool')
Agent messages render markdown correctly - 86 lists, 12 links, 52 headers found in test
Admin overview page shows Gateway Health (HEALTHY), Channels (Slack/WebChat), Active Sessions (40 sessions)
Backend health endpoint works at /api/health - returns status 'healthy', version '0.1.0'
Connection indicator shows 'live' when WebSocket is connected and authenticated
Sidebar toggle button collapses/expands session sidebar
Admin sidebar 'Open Chat' link navigates back to root /
critical_code_review_comments: Minor React hydration warning in ChatView.js line 118 - ReactMarkdown wraps table/thead/tbody in spans causing HTML nesting warnings. Cosmetic issue, tables render correctly.
seed_data_creation: None - used existing session data in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI redesign complete and working. Chat at /, Admin at /admin/*. 40+ sessions in DB with real conversation data including tool calls. WebSocket gateway at /api/gateway, auth token 'dev-token-change-me'. Tool call format is {tool: 'name', args: {...}, result: '...'}. All admin nav routes working: /admin/agents, /admin/skills, /admin/memory, /admin/tasks, /admin/notifications, /admin/gmail, /admin/slack, /admin/config
